Summary: ufo at harbor pass christian ms
divs: Sighting DetailsTaking photo of sea gulls at pass Christian harbor at the time they were bringing in oysters on the boats took a photo of a UFO with 2 trucks loading oyster sacks on to the UFO in broad daylite they noticed me and left in a hurry the UFO went up in the air I took a photo they must have a advanced stealth system ---I have a high state of Consciousness) iam 80 years old can also soul travel - be leave it or not- they have been with us for thousands of years they are here now thousands of them it is impossible to ID them be cause most do not know that they are being used - they call this planet of the apes- humans are from the ape family- also known as the ash can of the universe- they control the minds of men any time they want- they are masters at cloning -they will not interfere with our evolution they are thousands of years ahead of us in 1937 three men came to my grand fathers house were I was staying- they were there for 4 days at night and told me of my future and everything they said came to be true- and yes they gave me some power that I can use-- I met one of them 6 years ago he looked like a homeless man I looked into his eyes and quickly I was in outer space he showed me a map of the universe to were he was from? UFO this is what I know about them this one is small on three tripods as you get close it has a humming sound in side it is real simple you push a button a TV screen opens up you can see all around outside like a window- it has three turbine gyroscopes that feed on each other for balance it is run on advanced computers and to control gravity in the craft -it does not have any fuel-this one runs on gravity that pushes in one direction or the other in the air it skims along at unbelievable speeds it has no G-force it can hook on to any gravity likes the moon--- it can also go underwater-----can also tell you about my power that i can use- will not at this time. Thank You
